root.name: Justice League: Injustice for All
root.description: Lex Luthor is trying to take over the world and you need to stop him. You play one of the two choosing super heroes in the stage to fight your way threw to the end, fight a boss and repeat. Each super hero has just one of there powers, Batman with his Batarang, Superman with his laser vision, Wonder Woman with her Whip and so on.
